name: Smelling Salts
description: You procure a handful of strong smelling salt, damaging a creature's senses. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing 1d8 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. If the target is paralyzed, double the dice roll for the damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

contest.effect: Affected by how well the previous Pokemonâ€™s move went.
